project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Sort the word counts and retrieve the top 10 most common words
Implement terminal display for the top 10 words
Write tests for the file reading, word counting, and display functionalities
Execute tests on implemented functionalities to ensure correctness
